spec.expr:
_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND NOT fgt.srccountry:Reserved 
| stats by (fgt.srccountry) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND NOT fgt.dstcountry:Reserved 
| stats by (fgt.dstcountry) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND NOT fgt.srccountry:Reserved 
| stats by (fgt.srccountry) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 5

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND network.application:*
| stats by (network.application,fgt.utmaction) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND network.application:*
| stats by (fgt.appcat,fgt.utmaction) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.action,fgt.utmaction) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (rule.id_name,log.syslog.hostname) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
#AND fgt.utmaction:*
| stats by (fgt.utmaction) count() results

options.content:
- **deny** - Session was denied
- **accept** - Allowed Forward session
- **start** - Session starts (log message was created when the session was created)
- **dns** - DNS query return error
- **ip-conn** - Failed connection attempts
- **close** - Local-traffic session allowed
- **timeout** - Allowed session was timeout
- **client-rst** - Session reset by client
- **server-rst** - Session reset by server

spec.expr:
_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND fgt.unauthuser:*
| stats by (fgt.unauthuser,fgt.utmaction) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}

| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND fgt.dstunauthusersource:*
| stats by (fgt.dstunauthusersource,fgt.utmaction) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND network.bytes:*
#AND fgt.utmaction:*
| stats by (fgt.utmaction) sum(network.bytes) results

options.content:
- **deny** - Session was denied
- **accept** - Allowed Forward session
- **start** - Session starts (log message was created when the session was created)
- **dns** - DNS query return error
- **ip-conn** - Failed connection attempts
- **close** - Local-traffic session allowed
- **timeout** - Allowed session was timeout
- **client-rst** - Session reset by client
- **server-rst** - Session reset by server

| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND network.bytes:*
AND network.application:*
| stats by (fgt.appcat,fgt.utmaction) sum(network.bytes) results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql AND fgt.crscore:*
#AND fgt.utmaction:*
| stats by (fgt.utmaction) sum(fgt.crscore) results

options.content:
- **deny** - Session was denied
- **accept** - Allowed Forward session
- **start** - Session starts (log message was created when the session was created)
- **dns** - DNS query return error
- **ip-conn** - Failed connection attempts
- **close** - Local-traffic session allowed
- **timeout** - Allowed session was timeout
- **client-rst** - Session reset by client
- **server-rst** - Session reset by server

| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND fgt.dstreputation:*
| stats by (fgt.dstreputation,fgt.utmaction) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND fgt.dstname:*
| stats by (fgt.dstname,fgt.utmaction) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
AND network.transport_port:*
| stats by (network.transport_port,fgt.utmaction) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{log.syslog.hostname in (${firewall:doublequote}),fgt.vd in (${vdom:doublequote}),fgt.type=$type,fgt.subtype=$subtype,fgt.policytype=$policytype,network.direction in (${direction:doublequote}),fgt.logid!=0000000020}
AND NOT fgt.logid:0000000020 AND fgt.action:($action) AND $Logsql
| stats by (fgt.service,fgt.utmaction) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

spec.description:
Custom LogsQL filter attached to every query.
Set to "*" to not filter.
See https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victorialogs/logsql/
spec.name: Logsql
